docs.lead_paragraph: MARGARET WILSON has been progressing; her first novel, "The Able McLaughlins," dealt with a family of Scotch immigrants on the prairies somewhere west of Iowa during the period of the Civil War and just after, while her second and third books have been devoted to the Kenworthys and a small town of Illinois.

headline.main: Margaret Wilson Pursues the Fortunes of the Kenworthy Family; THE PAINTED ROOM. By Margaret Wilson. 271 pp. New York: Harper & Brothers. $2.
